## Workspace.undo() method

Undo or redo the previous action.

**Signature:**

```typescript
undo(redo: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  redo | boolean | False if undo, true if redo. |

**Returns:**

void
